Religio militis, or, The moral duty of a soldier shewing how he ought to behave himself towards God, his King and country. C. B.

Printed by H.C. for John Taylor ..., London : 1690.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library. Epistle dedicatory signed: C.B. Attributed to C.B. cf. Wing.
